content: We didn't end up talking about it on the call today, but the deadline for Connectathon track proposals is March 1 - before our call next week. I'm assuming that we want to have a track? Would like to hear opinions - pro and con, and about likely participation and scenarios.
My hope is to have the IPS track , but it depends on how many people can be interested in actively participate :-)
We do have an IPS track proposal for the May Connectathon. @John D'Amore submitted the proposal and has gotten approval to be the primary track lead.
